title: Dinnerbone：这周起快照改成每星期三发布
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-6-24 18:32 编辑 




@Dinnerbone
The Minecraft weekly snapshots will no longer have their regular debuts on Thursdays, we are moving them to Wednesdays starting this week.
Minecraft 每周快照将不会在每周四发布，从这周起，我们将发布时间改为每星期三。

replies.txt_content:
